summary: A comprehensive collection of unit tests that verify the functionality of custom Django testing utilities, including assertions for allowed database queries, query counts, queryset equality, exception messages, template usage, HTML/XML/JSON comparison, settings overrides, app isolation, conditional test skipping, and test environment setup.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of the project's testing helpers to ensure reliable test behavior, enforce data access policies, and streamline test configuration across the Django codebase.
